com.yelpdataset

Class LuceneWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yelpdataset.LuceneWriter

  • public class LuceneWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for writing a review with id and text in a particular lucene index.
    Author:
    Anwar Shaikh
